scripts.publish:npm: npm run copypackage && cd lib && npm publish
scripts.preversion: npm run clean-lib && npm run build && git add -fA lib
scripts.version:patch: npm version patch -m "Bump mblock-utils to v%s"
scripts.version:minor: npm version minor -m-m "Bump mblock-utils to v%s"
scripts.version:major: npm version major -m-m "Bump mblock-utils to v%s"
scripts.postversion: git push && git push --tags && npm run publish:npm && npm run clean-lib
